name: NomOrVom
tagline: Mozilla addon to provide food.gov.uk hygiene scores in Just Eat search results
body:
### Never eat from a dodgy takeaway again. 
Display food.gov.uk food hygiene scores in your Just Eat search results.

### Install
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/nomorvom/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
